snippet: Using techniques imported from the United States, Russia has the opportunity to reap large quantities of oil from shale beds.
abstract: Russia has opportunity to reap large quantities of oil from shale beds using techniques imported from United States; nation had set aside efforts to extract oil and natural gas because it had other reservoirs more easily tapped, but is jumping back into the race by importing techniques such as hydraulic fracturing; energy analysts say shift will lead to a shale oil boom in Russia to rival what has happened in North America.
lead_paragraph: Using techniques imported from the United States, Russia has the opportunity to reap large quantities of oil from shale beds.

headline.main: Russia Anticipates Boom in Oil Extracted From Shale
headline.print_headline:
Russia Sees New Benefits
To Shale Oil Extraction
